name: Hangman for kids - A classic Hangman game in 5 languages
name_original: Hangman for kids - A classic Hangman game in 5 languages
description:
Hangman for kids is a classic Hangman game with about 450 selected words for kids.

With 5 word categories (Western, Human body and clothes, Animals, Fruits and Vegetables and Misc.), your kids will have fun to guess words letter by letter.

The game is available on 5 languages (English, French, Italian, Spanish and German) directly available on the main screen.

And with the selection we did on words, there is no way that your kid will discover a word he should not see.

A statistic screen is also available to check your progression in the game.

This game is part of your collection of educational games "Learning is fun". Visit our website for more info: http://ar-entertainment.net/learning
